titles.title: MP167 Give me oil in my lamp

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Give me oil in my lamp, keep me burning,
give me oil in my lamp, I pray;
give me oil in my lamp, keep me burning,
keep me burning till the break of day.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Make me a fisher of men, keep me seeking
make me a fisher of men, I pray;
make me a fisher of men, keep me seeking
keep me seeking till the break of day.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give me joy in my heart, keep me singing,
give me joy in my heart, I pray;
give me joy in my heart, keep me singing,
keep me singing, till the break of day.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Give me love in my heart, keep me serving,
give me love in my heart, I pray;
give me love in my heart, keep me serving,
keep me serving till the break of day.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Sing hosanna, sing hosanna,
sing hosanna to the King of kings!
Sing hosanna, sing hosanna,
sing hosanna to the King.
